long.en:
Exploring the web often reveals countless pieces of information worth remembering, but taking notes in the moment isn't always easy. 
Web Memo is a browser extension created to solve this inconvenience.

From one-click instant note-taking to AI-powered content summarization, Web Memo enriches your web surfing experience.

Key Features:

ğŸ–‹ Easy Web Notes
Don't miss out on ideas or important content while browsing web pages. Take notes anytime, anywhere with just one click.

ğŸ“‘ Systematic Note Management
View all your notes at a glance. With our smart management system that automatically organizes notes by page, you can find what you need instantly.

ğŸ· Custom Categories
Organize and classify your notes in your own way. Create categories like work, hobbies, study, and more for systematic management.

ğŸ¤– AI-Powered Content Summary
Long articles are no longer a concern. AI extracts and concisely summarizes the core content. Save time while catching all the essential information.

ğŸ©· Wishlist
Don't lose track of content you can't view right now. Save interesting pages to your wishlist and check them out when it's convenient.

With Web Memo, web surfing becomes more efficient and enjoyable. Install now and experience a smarter web life.

----------

Get in Touch:

Your feedback makes Web Memo better.
Have suggestions for new features or improvements? Let us know anytime!
